name: AdvanceCarePlanPersonalCommitmentLevel
title: Advance Care Plan Personal Commitment Level
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes questions designed to elicit thoughts on whether the individual desires to reserve the right to overrule his or her written expressions of priorities, goals and preferences at a future time irrespective of the individual's mental state and decision-making capacity.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this value set is to identify the questions used to determine an individual's level of commitment to his or her advance directives or other expressions of priorities, goals and preferences for medical treatment and designation of surrogate decision-makers.),(Inclusion Criteria: The value set is defined by this list of concepts.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)

concept.display: Allowance to change advance directive preferences in the future regardless of mental state [Reported]

contains.display: Allowance to change advance directive preferences in the future regardless of mental state [Reported]
